instructions: If Spotify isn't on the device, download Spotify on your Samsung phone. Spotify comes preinstalled on all Samsung Galaxy S10, S10+, S10e, and Note 10 and 10+ devices. Press the Bixby key (a button on the side of the Samsung phone) to open Bixby Assistant Home . On the Note10, press and hold the Side Key to launch Bixby Voice. Swipe left to manage apps . Tap Spotify , then tap Connect Account . Log in or sign up for a Spotify account, and continue to allow access. Your Spotify account is now linked with Bixby, so you can ask the virtual assistant to play something.
